perturbation.original_text:
The total annual maintenance charge amounts to US $24502 for the first
year of maintenance. MORPHO shall pay all charges under this Agreement,
including the total Annual Maintenance Charge, within thirty (30) days
after receipt of a valid invoice from XIMAGE.
perturbation.changed_text:
The total annual maintenance charge amounts to US $24502 for the first
year of maintenance. MORPHO shall pay all charges under this Agreement,
including the total Annual Maintenance Charge, within sixty (60) days
after receipt of a valid invoice from XIMAGE.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by extending the payment deadline from 30 to 60 days in Section 6, while other sections may still refer to the original 30-day term. This creates uncertainty as to when payments are actually due and when late fees might apply.

perturbation.original_text:
XIMAGE agrees to respond to any telephone call made, within
30 minutes.
perturbation.changed_text:
XIMAGE agrees to respond to any telephone call made, within
60 minutes.
perturbation.explanation: Here the time to respond to a phone call has been changed from 30 minutes to 60, which is a direct contradiction and creates uncertainty about response times.

perturbation.original_text:
Hourly rate for intervention is $125.00 (one hundred and twenty
five Dollars).
perturbation.changed_text:
Hourly rate for intervention is $250.00 (two hundred and fifty
Dollars).
perturbation.explanation: The hourly intervention rate has been doubled without any indicator or change to other connected sections that reference this. This introduces a payment disagreement between both parties.
